block.p: EUNIVERSE, Los Angeles, an interactive entertainment network, said it had acquired the assets of privately held ResponseBase, Los Angeles, an online marketing company. Terms were not disclosed.

INVERNESS MEDICAL INNOVATIONS INC., Waltham, Mass., a provider of health and nutritional products for women, said it had agreed to buy Ostex International, Seattle, a medical technology company, for about $36.8 million in stock.
EUNIVERSE, Los Angeles, an interactive entertainment network, said it had acquired the assets of privately held ResponseBase, Los Angeles, an online marketing company. Terms were not disclosed.

INVERNESS MEDICAL INNOVATIONS INC., Waltham, Mass., a provider of health and nutritional products for women, said it had agreed to buy Ostex International, Seattle, a medical technology company, for about $36.8 million in stock.
EL PASO CORP., Houston, the biggest U.S. natural gas pipeline owner, sought federal approval for a $42.1 million expansion of pipelines in Wisconsin.
DANSKE BANK, Copenhagen, said it had sold Danica Life, Luxembourg, its insurance unit, to an international division of Nationwide Mutual Insurance, Columbus, Ohio. Terms were not disclosed.
